bike.description: Demo 7 FSR M5 manipulated alloy, 7" travel, asymetrical rear triangle, ISCG mount, adj. geometry, 1.5" forged HT, cartridge bearing rear shock mount, rear derailleur protector

components.description: Fox DHX 4.0 coil 8.5x2.375" for Demo 7, rebound adj., ProPedal, bottom out control, S:450, M:500, L:550
Rockshox Totem IS, Coil spring, 180mm travel, IS damper, external compression and rebound adj., 1.5" alloy steerer, 20mm thru-axle w/ Maxle 360
1.5" Threadless, lightweight 7050 alloy cups
Specialized 1.5", 35mm extension, OS 31.8, 4-bolt, forged
Specialized Demo low-rise bar, 7050 alloy, 31.8mm, 750mm wide, 9 degree backsweep, 6 degree up sweep
Specialized waffle lock on grip with alloy end plugs
Custom Avid Elixir R hydraulic disc, reach adjust, metallic pads, 203mm rotor
Custom Avid Elixir R, hydraulic disc, reach adjust, metallic pads, 185mm rotor
Custom Avid Elixir R Hydraulic, tool-less adj. reach
SRAM X-9, 9-speed, short cage
SRAM X-7, aluminum trigger
Shimano HG61, 9-speed, 11-34t
SRAM PC-971, 9-speed w/Power Link
FSA Moto-X MegaExo, forged solid arms, 36t alloy ring with Gamut P-30 chain guide
36t, alloy 4-bolt, compact 104mm pattern
FSA BB-7000 for Moto-X crank, 73mm shell
Specialized Lo-Pro alloy
Custom DT Swiss F550, 30mm wide, 32h
Hi-Lo disc, 20mm thru-axle, 32h
Thru axle 135mm, hollow 10mm Cr-Mo axle w/ RD guard
DT Swiss Champion 2mm stainless
Specialized Clutch SX 26x2.3", SX casing, aramid bead,  dual compound
Specialized Chunder SX 26x2.3", SX casing aramid bead,  dual compound
Schraeder valve 26x2.4/2.75, 2.25mm thick
Specialized Enduro, 8mm hollow Cr-Mo rails, SL foam
6061 butted alloy, two bolt no offset, 30.9mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual
